title: Elon Musk on EV Subsidies, Corporate Titles and China: The Full Transcript
sub_head: Read the full interview of the Tesla chief from The Wall Street Journal’s CEO Council Summit
body:
Elon Musk joined The Wall Street Journal’s CEO Council Summit virtually on Monday for an interview with columnist Joanna Stern. Here is the transcript of that Dec. 6 exchange with the chief executive of Tesla Inc. and Space Exploration Technologies Corp.
Elon Musk
